  • Constructor Details

    • Car

      public Car(String brand, String model, String description, int maxSpeed, int horsepower, float acceleration, boolean available, String type, byte[] image, String imageMediaType)
      Constructs a new Car object with the specified attributes.
      Parameters:
      brand - The brand of the car.
      model - The model of the car.
      description - The description of the car.
      maxSpeed - The maximum speed of the car in kilometers per hour.
      horsepower - The horsepower of the car.
      acceleration - The acceleration of the car (0-100 km/h time in seconds).
      available - True if the car is available for use; otherwise, false.
      type - The type or category of the car (e.g., sedan, SUV).
      image - The image data of the car.
      imageMediaType - The media type of the image (e.g., "image/jpeg", "image/png").

    • writeJSON

      protected void writeJSON(OutputStream out) throws Exception
      Writes the car object's data in JSON format to the provided output stream.
      Specified by:
      writeJSON in class AbstractResource
      Parameters:
      out - The output stream to write the JSON data to.
      Throws:
      Exception - if there's an error during JSON writing.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string representation of the car object.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string containing the brand, model, description, maximum speed, horsepower, acceleration, availability, and type of the car.

    • fromJSON

      public static Car fromJSON(InputStream in) throws IOException
      Constructs a Car object from JSON data read from the provided input stream.
      Parameters:
      in - The input stream containing the JSON data representing the car object.
      Returns:
      A new Car object constructed from the JSON data.
      Throws:
      IOException - if there's an error reading from the input stream or parsing the JSON data.

    • hasPhoto

      public final boolean hasPhoto()
      Checks if the car has a photo available.

      true if the car has a photo; false otherwise.
